svg:

Main Game Screen Layout:The game world is viewed from above (bird's eye view)Player character is centered or slightly offset from center of the screenThe camera follows the player's movement smoothlyVisual Elements:Player character: Visible sprite that shows directional movementHUD (Heads Up Display) elements positioned at screen edges:Health bar (top-left corner)Stamina/Mana bar (below health)Mini-map (top-right corner)Current equipped item/weapon (bottom-right)Quick inventory slots (bottom of screen)Movement System:1. Four-directional movement:W or ↑: Move upS or ↓: Move downA or ←: Move leftD or →: Move right2. Diagonal movement possible by pressing two directions simultaneouslyCharacter sprite animates based on movement directionMovement speed remains constant unless modified by status effects or player input (like running)Environment Interaction:Collision detection with obstacles (walls, trees, rocks)Interactive objects highlight when player is in rangeBasic interaction prompt appears when near interactive objects
